## ValidComponentDisplayName type

Ensures that a component display name is alphanumeric and begins with an uppercase letter.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare type ValidComponentDisplayName<Name> = Name extends `${UppercaseLetter}${infer Tail}` ? OnlyChars<Letter | Digit, Tail> : never;
```
**References:** [UppercaseLetter](./react.uppercaseletter.md)<!-- -->, [OnlyChars](./react.onlychars.md)<!-- -->, [Letter](./react.letter.md)<!-- -->, [Digit](./react.digit.md)
